main_definition: To obtain, receive or come into possession of something.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To understand or realize a concept or situation.
meanings_and_examples.example: It took me a while to get the joke.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To receive someone, often as a welcome gesture.
meanings_and_examples.example: I'll get you when I come back home.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To become affected by something, such as an illness or emotion.
meanings_and_examples.example: She caught the flu and had to stay in bed for a few days.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To acquire or obtain something through effort or action.
meanings_and_examples.example: I need to get groceries on my way home from work.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To make progress towards achieving a goal or objective.
meanings_and_examples.example: The project is getting closer to completion.
